item.description:
Just wanted to let you know about Pecha-Kucha tonight at Firehouse 13! Our own Gray Jones and Cindy Loveless are presenting. I also heard something about Big Nazo. I went last month and it was really cool! So, let's check it out!:

Announcing the 19th Pecha Kucha night in Providence! The theme is "creative conversation, as we are celebrating National Arts and Humanities month with special guests from the creative community. To do this, we are partnering up with the Providence Dept of Art, Culture and Tourism, RI Citizens for the Arts, RI State Council on the Arts, and RI Council for the Humanities.

If you haven't yet heard of this global yet unpronounceable phenomenon, Pecha Kucha is a monthly format for sharing ideas, in which presenters are allotted 20 slides and 20 seconds per slide. Put simply: 6 minutes and 40 seconds of adult-style ...show & tell. It began in Tokyo in 2003, has since spread to over 300 cities worldwide, and first landed in Providence in March of 09.

***Doors open at 7:20, presentations start at 8:20, and shmoozing goes down throughout.***
http://www.pecha-kuch...

Presenters:
* Gray Jones/Cindy Loveless
* Anna Shapiro
* Stephanie Gerson/Luke Harris
* Erminio Pinque
* Sebastian Ruth
* G. Wayne Miller
* Hillary Jones
* Special Guest
item.how_to_find_us: I'll probably be there around 8:00 and wearing a silver scarf!
item.name: Pecha-Kucha at Firehouse 13 - TONIGHT!!!!
